alternativeNames: Zhang, Yun Bin; Chang, Yi Bi; Chang, Yun Bing
examples: Saxifraga zhejiangensis Z. Wei & Y.B. Chang in Bull. Bot. Res. North-East. Forest. Inst. 9(2): 33 (1989), as 'Chang Yi Bi'.  Prunus japonica var. zhejiangensis Y. B.Chang in Bull. Bot. Res.
